title: 【暮风搬运】Vault 7 七号地下基地 一张探险地图（持续更新）
author: MF_Mufeng
txt_content:
本帖最后由 MF_Mufeng 于 2018-10-1 14:10 编辑 



Vault 7





Introduction-地图简介


欢迎来到7号地下基地！
这是一个掌握了其他基地实践经验的地下基地。
7号地下基地里的居民被很好地组织了起来。
你，也就是玩家，出身于富人家庭，是一个既富有又幸运的人。
你意外发现，有一些人从地下室中消失了。
探索这个地下基地，并查明究竟发生了什么。
出门去外面寻找你的杀手朋友。
你可以决定下一步将会发生何事。
Q(Question问题)和A(Answer答案)
在下面评论，关于“我的计划是什么”和“即将来到的更新”:)
作者：logan clash更新日志（陆续更新汉化中）Update #40 : 2 days agoJul 3*Began to wrap up one of the Middle Class rooms area*More of the town is done!>Other<*Began to experiment with some World Edit to improve the Map. Its not for quantity, but for quality!
Update #39 : 20 days agoJun 15*New DemoDemo 1.9 is now out!* There is now a Discord for Vault 7 Everyone is welcomeUpdate #38 New Images : 25 days agoJun 10* Added New Images * Replaced an old photo with an updated photo of the same thing*Removed one image*Added 4 New Images never seen before.Update #37 Major Updated! Vault almost done! : 27 days agoJun 8After 6 months of waiting there has been some updates!*Theater area Finished*all Rich class Rooms finished*Updated atrium area*Finished Lower class RoomsDemo coming in the next week or so!>outside*More buildings*Layout has been planned out>story*Story Board is Finished!Update #36 : 7 months agoNov 26, 2017* back to work on Vault 7 as I prepare the next update!*which will include*most areas finished or started*more of the town finished*and tons more stuff.*Stay Tuned for more!=O=Update #35 : 8 months agoOct 28, 2017*Happy Halloween lots of new Stuff added!*2 new buildings outside*everything is Spooky*updated the Red Rocket on last time*finished atrium*new people in the Vault!*and more to find!*New Demo Halloween Update!Update #34 : 8 months agoOct 25, 2017*New Launch date for the next demo is Oct. 28!*Complete Movie Theater*Bank*New Rich Class Rooms* New Middle Class Rooms>Outside* New Building* New House>Other*Everything has been made Decorated for Halloween!*Happy Halloween Early!Update #33 : 9 months agoOct 15, 2017*finished Atrium* made Plans for New Stuff*Finished Room C-1*Began Work on C-3*added some people to vaultUpdate #32 : 9 months agoOct 7, 2017*New Update coming soon*whats to come*finished rich class homes*finished middle class aps*nuka world water park*movie theater* poor class dormsStay tuned for more!Update #31 : 10 months agoSep 8, 2017preparing for Halloween Vault 7!lots of stuff coming in the next few months*update some photosUpdate #30 : 10 months agoAug 31, 2017*new Demo 1.8 Early version this demo will broken down into 3 parts*adds Room C-4*2 more people at Sunnyside cafe!

Pictures-美图鉴赏


















Information - 信息

进展：5%（作者回复：在我的计划中，有很多还没有完成。比如，完善7号地下基地，完成城镇建造、任务设计、故事线设计、故事序幕，还有很多很多。）标签：地图、冒险、3D艺术、挑战、Fallout系列、冒险挑战。参与：the Fallout Franchise, IVIICHAELxx (我看他的教学，是最初的地下基地大门制作者) mumbo jumbo (我看了他的教程，是最初的地下基地核反应堆制作者) Mrcubey (我看了他的教学，是最初地下基地钥匙卡门的制作者)授权(permission)：1. 未经作者许可，不得复制、转载、摘编、原帖内容或本帖内容进行使用2. 不能暗示此地图为您的作品或您原创，更不要将地图作为您的作品再次发布3. 您可在原作者知情的情况下将此地图用于您的服务器，也可标注地图作者名字4. 如本贴内容侵犯了版权，请联系我，确认属实后会删除所有内容并致以道歉5. 本地图转载纯属为个人行为，仅代表个人立场以及观点，与论坛官方立场无关6. 本转载帖最终解释权归MF_Mufeng所有，作品最终解释权归原作者logan clash所有
